title: Matt Hancock – 2021 Comments about Health Situation in London
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Matt Hancock, the Secretary of State for Health and Social Care, on 1 January 2021.
content:
Over the past week we have seen infections and hospitalisations rise sharply across London and hospitals are coming under increased pressure.
